title: For you madam. [No. 70/12] = Pour vous madame
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television programs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television series
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Perfume
description: Cinemagazine item on French perfumes. Shows the travels of perfume from Gras to Paris. First the flowers are picked, the essential oils pressed out then distilling in a warehouse. In the laboratory these are mixed by "the hose". We then see bottles being bvlown ready for the perfume. Each designer has a perfume and we see the dress and the finished bottle. However it takes 160 people to produce 9,000 bottles a day. Designers appearing on film include Dior, Givenchy, Guy La Roche, Chanel etc.
